org.jboss.msc.txn

Class TransactionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.msc.txn.TransactionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attachable

    public final class TransactionController
extends Object
    A transaction controller, creates transactions and manages them.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd, Richard Opalka, Flavia Rainone

      • newTask

        public <T> TaskBuilder<T> newTask(BasicTransaction transaction,
                         Executable<T> task)
                       throws IllegalStateException,
                              SecurityException
        Adds a task with an executable component to transaction. If the task implements Revertible interface, the corresponding builder property will be pre-initialized.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction
        task - the task
        Returns:
        the subtask builder
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the transaction is not open
        SecurityException - if transaction was not created by this controller

      • newTask

        public TaskBuilder<Void> newTask(BasicTransaction transaction)
                          throws IllegalStateException,
                                 SecurityException
        Adds a task without an executable component to transaction. All task components will be uninitialized.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction
        Returns:
        the subtask builder
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the transaction is not open
        SecurityException - if transaction was not created by this controller

      • prepare

        public void prepare(BasicTransaction transaction,
           Listener<? super PrepareResult<BasicTransaction>> completionListener)
             throws InvalidTransactionStateException,
                    SecurityException
        Prepare transaction. It is an error to prepare a transaction with unreleased tasks. Once this method returns, either commit(BasicTransaction, Listener) or abort(BasicTransaction, Listener) must be called. After calling this method (regardless of its outcome), the transaction can not be directly modified before termination.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction to be prepared
        completionListener - the listener to call when the prepare is complete or has failed
        Throws:
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if the transaction has already been rolled back, prepared or committed
        SecurityException - if transaction was not created by this controller

      • commit

        public void commit(BasicTransaction transaction,
          Listener<? super CommitResult<BasicTransaction>> completionListener)
            throws InvalidTransactionStateException,
                   SecurityException
        Commit the work done by prepare(BasicTransaction, Listener) and terminate transaction.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction to be committed
        completionListener - the listener to call when the commit is complete
        Throws:
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if the transaction has already been committed or has not yet been prepared
        SecurityException - if transaction was not created by this controller

      • abort

        public void abort(BasicTransaction transaction,
         Listener<? super AbortResult<BasicTransaction>> completionListener)
           throws InvalidTransactionStateException,
                  SecurityException
        Abort transaction, undoing all work executed up until this time. Abort can be called only after transaction's prepare request.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction to be aborted
        completionListener - the listener to call when the abort is complete
        Throws:
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if the transaction has already been aborted or if commit has already been initiated
        SecurityException - if transaction was not created by this controller

      • rollback

        public void rollback(BasicTransaction transaction,
            Listener<? super RollbackResult<BasicTransaction>> completionListener)
              throws InvalidTransactionStateException,
                     SecurityException
        Rollback transaction, undoing all work executed up until this time. Rollback can be called only before transaction's prepare request.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction to be rolled back
        completionListener - the listener to call when the roll back is complete
        Throws:
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if prepare has already been initiated
        SecurityException - if transaction was not created by this controller

      • canCommit

        public boolean canCommit(BasicTransaction transaction)
                  throws InvalidTransactionStateException,
                         SecurityException
        Determine whether a prepared transaction can be committed. If it cannot, it must be aborted.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction
        Returns:
        true if the transaction can be committed, false if it must be aborted
        Throws:
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if the transaction is not prepared
        SecurityException - if transaction was not created by this controller

      • owns

        public boolean owns(Transaction transaction)
        Determines whether the specified transaction have been created by this controller.
        Parameters:
        transaction - to be checked
        Returns:
        true if transaction have been created by this controller, false otherwise

        Specified by:

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        key - the key
        expectedValue - the expected value
